Allen Gibson has been a member of the Department of Athletics staff since June of 2000, serving as the Associate Director of Athletics/Facilities and Operations since March of 2002. In this role, he is responsible for overseeing the athletic facilities, managing game-day operations, and is the primary administrator for men's and women's tennis, men's and women's rowing and women's soccer.

Gibson manages the operating budget that provides equipment and game support for all varsity sports. He handles game day operations for all home events, and is the liaison to campus operations for maintenance and renovation of athletic facilities.

A native of Prospect, Conn., Gibson began as a Public Relations Intern at the Atlantic 10 Conference in 1993-94, before serving in a similar role for the New York Giants the following year. He was hired as the assistant director of ticket operations at Villanova in Nov. 1995, a post he held through June 1997, when he was named assistant director of Athletic Facilities and operations at the Philadelphia, Pa., school.

Gibson is very active within the local community, currently serving as the Vice President of the Bridgeport Charger Youth Sports Organization, a post he has held since 2006.

Gibson, and his wife Nadine, reside in Seymour, Conn., with their three children.
